TextView.android:text: About BookVan

BookVan is a ride-sharing mobile application and website platform that will provide commuters in Palawan to book and reserve their seats in the shuttle vans within their vicinity in an online and offline set-up. This is a third-party platform that connects the van operator and passenger to provide cost-saving, time-saving, and convenience for both commuters and van operators. It is the first and only van booking and ride-sharing mobile application in Palawan, aiming to provide an innovative solution and change the mode of van transportation in Palawan.
Our Office
Social Media
How can we book/reserve seat to\nyou?
We confirm booking by: Online (Facebook/messenger and mobile application), by phone (text or call), by website
Do you have online payment?
On next update
Do you pick up in PPC?
Yes. We can pick up anywhere in the city like airports, hotels, restaurants, etc. This is part of our service
Where are the vans located?
Puerto Princesa City Terminal
Do you have a tour packages?

None. We are a Technology Company and not a travel and tours agency. If you already have a travel agency in mind, let them know that you wish to book your ride with us and we shall coordinate with them.
What is your fare price?
Same as the fare guidelines issued by the LTFRB Land Transportation Franchising and Regulatory Board (LTFRB).
Can we rent a van through your\ncompany?
What is unique with BookVan?
Offline booking on next update, price can be cheap, tracking of shuttle vans, Uber/grab like set-up with seats options.
Do you have the list of schedules\nof trips?

Yes, we do have schedule of trips. Just visit the mobile app/website and select departure date, point of interest and time. Should you wish to continue, the app/website will notify that you have successfully booked, unless otherwise cancelled or disregarded booking is invalid.
Do you have trips from North to PPC?
Yes, we provide our services in the whole island of Palawan
Do you have trips from South to PPC?
Yes, we provide our services in the whole island of Palawan
I want to cancel my booking.
Yes of course, cancelled booking is free of charge.
How to book?
Application link/website link/video link
Do you accept multiple passenger\nin one booking?
Yes, a category listed in the application/website indicate how many persons wants to ride.
Do you deliver?
Yes we do delivery.
Can I become a private vehicle owner\nand use the application as a customer?
Yes, just visit our office for further assistance or you may call us, 0961-027-5583.
Do you accept PWD discount?
Yes, by just presenting your PWD ID and pay your fare to the Van Driver and a 20% PWD discounted rate is acceptable from the official government laws.
I forgot my email/password
Please send us an email for verification regarding of your concern to revive your BookVan account. Personal details may be asked for verification. Your call may be monitored for quality assurance.
Do you have promos or discounts?
Yes, please visit our Facebook page/website/app to keep you updated
